baseline_groups.claim_summary: Cement demand is price-elastic (negative price elasticity).
baseline_groups.notes: OLS baseline: coef = -0.47. Market FE, clustered by market.
Nested logit baseline. Route FE, clustered by route.

global_notes: Methods paper demonstrating covariance restriction estimators. Two empirical applications: cement (1984-2009) and airlines (2004). Some IV instruments are weak.
